alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 5:31AM PDT until April 12 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT TUESDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
